name: Unknown Woods
description:
Unknown wood is a brutal FPS game where missing a shot can mean life or death
You are a man who is obsessed with mythical creatures of the woods and you are on an adventure to a closed of and banned to the public area of the forest. In here you are trying to find out if the legends are true and do the mythical creatures actually exist.



Features:

Hand crafted semi open world.

Different paths to achieve the goals.

Mythical creatures and aggressive wildlife to fight.

Brutal damage, missing a shot can be fatal.

Dark and creepy atmosphere

NVIDIA DLSS support
